name: Yumkasaurus
title: Yumkasaurus: Artful Grapple
desc: Yumkasaurs are extremely skilled at latching onto heavy objects, then pulling themselves forward to move with great rapidity. They're also a great way to retrieve items from afar...

skills.desc:
Technique: Artful Grapple
Usage(s): 2
(A character can only equip 1 Technique at a time)
